name: San Luis Obispo, California, United States

agencies.name: San Luis Obispo Regional Transit Authority

records.notes: A Santa Maria bound RTA Route 10S bus was seen at N Thompson Ave & U.S. Route 101 in Nipomo.
A Downtown San Luis Obispo bound SLO Transit Route 1A bus was seen at Broad St & Tank Farm Rd in San Luis Obispo.
An out-of-service RTA bus was seen at Santa Rosa St & Olive St in San Luis Obispo.
